readability_reflection: string interpolation is easier to read compare to string concatenation. in my opinion, {} makes it easier to distinguish that you're inserting a string rather than using +, it could be considered as different type of variable not only string. also, it make the line of code shorter while still keep it clean, since string concatenation is easier to use to but need more spaces and double quotes ""
comprehension_debugging: does not matter but I sometimes confused of many double quotes and + when concatenating
preference_rationale: I have the ability to use both since string concatenation is easier to use and string interpolation makes the code looks clean
learning_curve: I have learned C++ and I basically use string concatenation and JavaScript, Python use string interpolation
suggestions_improvement: there are unique rules for using different techniques, it should be available both techniques for the coder so consider using them in each language.
